reviewText: I bought these for a women's shelter.  The inhabitants say they love these movies.
Cold Mountain teaches us to appreciate our lives during the Civil war. Not many movies like this and is a requirement to own if you care about America.
I have not seen them all.
Nicole Kidman is a fine actress and I enjoy her willingness to perform in a lot of different story lines.
Nicole Kidman is an excellent actress, and these 4 movies are a very good indication of it. Excellent DVDS  all very good movies. I strongly recommend it.

Nicole Kidman 4 film collection is great but the quality of the CD seems poor and Cold Mountain does not play well.
Extremely disappointed in Horse Whisper (i guess I paid for my lack of knowledge)

of coarse cold mountian is the reason for the 5 stars,the other films are just ok. cold mountian is one of the best films ever,with great acting,beautiful photography and a haunting love story set in the middle of the worst war ever endured by United States.
very graphic scenes make you feel as though you have just been in battle! the ending is not you typical"Hollywood ending" and will leave you exhausted!
I risked it.  I lost.  These discs do not play in Australia.  I know these films are all excellent. Nicole has been a worthy Oscar winner.
This is some strange stuff.  Rabbit Hole is pretty good but the others are movies I wouldn't watch again.
